components.description: The Sagittarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents an Archer.
components.title: Sagittarius

description: The Sagittarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents an Archer.
title: Sagittarius

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: The Sagittarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents an Archer. Sagittarius was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in http://emojipedia.org/sagittarius/
emoji_net_data.name: Sagittarius

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

bn:16684083n: Someone with a Sagittarius star sign.
Someone with a Sagittarius star sign
Sagittarius is the ninth astrological sign, which is associated with the constellation Sagittarius.
A Zodiac sign corresponding to the constellation

bn:00068829n: A large zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Scorpius and Capricornus
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Sagittarius is one of the constellations of the zodiac.
